text: Culoz-Béon is a commune. It is in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Ain department in east France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2023 and consists of the former communes of Culoz (the seat) and Béon. == References == Category:2023 establishments in France Category:Communes in Ain
title: Culoz-Béon
